title: URGENT: Fix Acme CoreAPI auth token expiry issue
description: Critical P0 blocker for Feb 5 launch. 401 error in load testing. Token expiration mismatch between auth server and API gateway.

title: Coordinate Acme CoreAPI regression testing post-hotfix
description: Run full regression test suite after hotfix. Coordinate with Sara (Acme) QA team. Ensure 100% coverage before Feb 5 launch.

title: War room - Acme API blocker resolution
description: Meeting with Acme Corp (Sara Johnson, API lead) + Contoso team. Discuss hotfix plan, testing strategy, timeline.

title: Deep dive technical review - TechVision Phase 2 architecture
description: Address David Chen concerns on auto-scaling thresholds, multi-region failover strategy, compliance requirements.

title: Evaluate API Gateway addition to TechVision Phase 2
description: David Chen requested adding API Gateway. Assess impact on timeline, resource allocation, and costs.

title: Finalize procurement timeline for TechVision 500k infrastructure
description: Finance approved 500k spend. Work with David Chen to finalize procurement timeline, vendor selection.

title: ESCALATE: GlobalTech firewall issue may delay pilot 3-4 weeks
description: Amit discovered legacy undocumented firewall rules blocking VPN endpoints. 3-4 week resolution timeline threatens Feb 10 board review.

title: Debug and remediate GlobalTech firewall VPN endpoint blocking
description: Work with GlobalTech network team to identify legacy firewall rules and propose solutions.

title: Prepare GlobalTech board review slides (timeline, risks, ROI)
description: Marcus requested slides for Feb 10 board review. Must include timeline/milestones, risk assessment, cost-benefit analysis.

title: Prepare RCA and recovery plan for Acme API issue
description: Rajesh needs root cause analysis, recovery plan with revised timeline for board brief by tomorrow morning.

title: Perform detailed API token expiry trace and analysis
description: Priya offered to do detailed trace on token expiry mismatch. Can be ready in 2 hours.

title: QA status assessment - all active projects
description: Neha reported: Acme 85% ready for UAT, TechVision infrastructure tests done, GlobalTech blocked.

title: Complete annual compliance and security training
description: Mandatory training due by Feb 5. Takes 45 minutes. Must complete to remain audit-ready.

title: Submit Q1 tech debt review list
description: Submit list of tech debt items with effort estimates and delivery impact by Feb 1.

title: Weekly sync with Rajesh - Monday 10 AM
description: Review progress on all three client projects. Bring status updates and any escalations.

title: Plan Acme Phase 2 scope discussion
description: Sara requested Phase 2 scope discussion. Opportunity to clarify requirements post-Phase 1 retrospective.

title: Initiate compliance review for TechVision Phase 2
description: David Chen mentioned need for compliance sign-off before proceeding. Coordinate with compliance team.

title: Schedule technical deep-dive with TechVision team
description: Book Feb 3 or 4 for detailed architecture discussion on auto-scaling, failover, compliance.

title: Develop contingency plan for GlobalTech if firewall fix delays
description: If firewall resolution takes 3-4 weeks, what are alternative approaches? Parallel VPN config, phased rollout?

title: Prepare GlobalTech pilot environment (when firewall cleared)
description: Once firewall issue is resolved, set up pilot environment for testing. Coordinate with Amit.

The payment service started returning 500 errors 30 minutes ago. We're losing approximately $50K per hour in failed transactions.

- Started at 2:15 PM after the latest deployment
- Database connections are maxing out
- Rollback attempted but...
